Comment: You‚Äôre talking about replacing a decades-established foreign embedded global aid organization with ten thousand people directly employed and countless more whose entire livelihood depended on its existence. ‚ÄúStepping up‚Äù isn something that happens overnight. USAID took decades to build, untold amounts of hardship endured in some of the most ravished parts of the planet to save lives and lift up humanity.  Do you know what these people did? They weren‚Äôt just handing out food. They saved millions from malaria, tuberculosis‚Ä¶ HIV/AIDS‚Ä¶  The aids one is particularly rough. There‚Äôs a cheap medicine that you can give to a pregnant mother who has HIV, that will vastly cut the odds their child will be born with HIV. The existence of this medicine and USAID‚Äôs involvement in bringing it to the most impacted regions vastly reduced childhood HIV across the continent.  Those meds aren‚Äôt going to be administered. Hundreds of babies are being born with HIV every single day, that would have been born healthy had Trump not stroked that pen. The impact of just that tiny little aspect of this will be absolutely horrific.  It would take decades to rebuild what was lost. There is no ‚Äúinterim‚Äù that doesn‚Äôt result in an absolutely obscene amount of human suffering and death all from the stroke of a pen. When we look back, years from now, I won‚Äôt be surprised if the dead number in the millions. If you really want to know, do a little google-fu or ask every LLM in existence about how many lives USAID saved per year, and extrapolate how many lives they actively won‚Äôt.  One of the single most heinous acts ever committed on humanity as a whole. It‚Äôs an act of evil, frankly. There‚Äôs no other way to swing it.  But the world won‚Äôt save those people either. They‚Äôll be allowed to die.  If you haven‚Äôt been watching what‚Äôs going on around the planet, most of the developed world has actually steeply cut their foreign aid so they can refocus that money on building bullets (Europe is actively arming itself).
